thread.title: Citigroup Profit Soars on Lower Litigation Costs
thread.title_full: Citigroup Profit Soars on Lower Litigation Costs

title: Citigroup Profit Soars on Lower Litigation Costs
text:
Citigroup Profit Soars on Lower Litigation Costs Earnings a year earlier were nearly wiped out by settlement over mortgage securities practices By Updated July 16, 2015 5:24 p.m. ET 
The first half of 2015 has been relatively boring for Citigroup Inc. Shareholders will take it. 
The New York bank turned in its second consecutive drama-free quarterly earnings report Thursday, beating expectations and sending shares 3.8% higher. 
The results, which came in large part because of a sharp drop in legal costs, give Citigroup CEO Michael Corbat more momentum after a difficult 2014 in which his firm failed a... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Popular on WSJ
